song.title: Great Are You Lord
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .C Em D
[V] . C Em You give life, You are love . D You bring light to the darkness || . C Em You give hope, You restore . D Every heart that is broken .C Em D Great are You, Lord
[C] . C Em It's Your breath in our lungs . D So we pour out our praise . We pour out our praise || . C Em It's Your breath in our lungs . D So we pour out our praise to You only
---
[Instrumental] .G Gsus C2 G
[B] .G All the earth will shout Your praise .Gsus Our hearts will cry, these bones will sing || .C2 G Great are You, Lord
song.presentation: V C V C B C
